messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Hello! New to Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Connie!  YAY another unschooling mom in Houston! I will def. email you off-list - maybe we can meet up in Houston with the kiddos. -Darcy
messages.messageBody:
Hi Connie! YAY another unschooling mom in Houston!

I will def. email you off-list - maybe we can meet up in Houston with the kiddos.




-Darcy






________________________________
From: "otherstar@..." <otherstar@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, September 24, 2009 4:46:18 PM
Subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Hello! New to Unschooling


Hi from another unschooling mom in Houston! Feel free to e-mail me off list.
I have an 8 year old, a 5 year old, a 2 year old, and an 8 month old. (all
girls)

Connie

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@ yahoogroups. com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@ yahoogroups. com]On Behalf Of Umm Ilyas
Sent: Thursday, September 24, 2009 2:59 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@ yahoogroups. com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Hello! New to Unschooling

Hi All!

My name is Darcy, and I am just starting our 'official' unschooling
journey with our children, Ilyas (6) and Halemah (16 mo). I say 'official'
as I find we've been unschooling all along, just didn't have a name for it!

We live in the Houston area and tried PS for a few weeks last fall. It
didn't work for my son, nor for me (I am a horrible PS mom, I found). I then
read a few John Holt books, which basically gave me the "OK" to do what my
gut was telling me all along.

I've been reading through the messages and printed out the book list.
Thank you so much for such a great resource!!

-Darcy

messages.messageBody:
Hi All!

My name is Darcy, and I am just starting our 'official' unschooling journey with our children, Ilyas (6) and Halemah (16 mo). I say 'official' as I find we've been unschooling all along, just didn't have a name for it!

We live in the Houston area and tried PS for a few weeks last fall. It didn't work for my son, nor for me (I am a horrible PS mom, I found). I then read a few John Holt books, which basically gave me the "OK" to do what my gut was telling me all along.

I've been reading through the messages and printed out the book list. Thank you so much for such a great resource!!

-Darcy
